description: Classic Pong game with two paddles and a ball. Player 1 (left) is AI-controlled, Player 2 (right) is controlled by arrow keys.
expectedControls: Player 1: W/S keys (AI-controlled), Player 2: Arrow keys, Escape to pause

actions.name: Pause
actions.description: Pause the game and open pause menu

loadingIndicators.description: Start button appears when game is ready
Game title displays on main menu

successIndicators.description: Score should increment when ball crosses paddle
Ball should move across screen smoothly
Paddles should be visible and respond to input

testingStrategy.instructions: Click start button, wait for ball to serve, test paddle movement with arrow keys, verify score changes when ball crosses paddle, test pause functionality with Escape key
